resources.string: Your body weight is below the healthy range for your height and age. It may indicate inadequate nutrition or other issues. Consider gaining weight for better health.
Your weight falls within the recommended healthy range for your height and age. Maintain your weight for optimal health!
You have excess body weight that falls above the healthy range for your height and age, which can increase your risk of health problems.
You are in a condition where excess body fat accumulation can negatively impact your health. It can significantly increase your risk of chronic diseases.
You have a severe degree of obesity that poses a significant health risk. It may require medical intervention and drastic lifestyle changes to address.
